name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior Nutanix Infrastructure Engineer with 8+ years of experience, I specialize in optimizing data center infrastructure and ensuring seamless disaster recovery solutions. Proficient in using **Nutanix**, **Citrix**, **NVIDIA**, and **Prism Central**, I excel in leveraging **Nutanix Flow**, **Nutanix CLI**, and **NGT Tools** for efficient management and orchestration of cloud resources. My expertise extends to **AWS** integration, Linux system administration, and implementing role-based access control (RBAC) to enhance security and compliance. With a strong background in networking and infrastructure design, I am adept at delivering reliable, high-performing systems tailored to diverse business needs, while consistently adhering to industry best practices.
